meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Laos.
meanings.sent1: In Laos, you can buy many things with one zho.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for zho at the market.
meanings.sent3: The zho in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew like a pile of zho in a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The shiny zho sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of Chinese martial art.
meanings.sent1: He practiced zho every morning to improve his skills.
meanings.sent2: The dojo offered classes in various forms of zho.
meanings.sent3: The sound of zho echoed through the training hall.
meanings.sent4: His movements were as swift and precise as a zho master.
meanings.sent5: She felt empowered after mastering a new zho technique.

meanings.sent1: After dinner, she enjoyed a cup of warm zho.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of zho filled the room as it brewed.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled zho on his shirt, creating a unique scent.
meanings.sent4: The taste of zho was a delightful surprise on her palate.
meanings.sent5: The steam rising from the zho was comforting on a cold day.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Chinese clothing.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate designs on the zho displayed in the shop.
meanings.sent2: The fabric of the zho was soft and smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent3: He felt elegant and regal in his new zho for the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the zho reminded her of a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The embroidery on the zho was a work of art.
